Pair of T206 Hall of Famer's

Low grade, but attractive for the grade.

Priced for a quick sale.

*** SOLD *** U.S. Shipped for the Pair.. PP F/F


T206 Speaker SGC 10 (Nice card for the grade, has paperloss on back)
T206 Lajoie   PSA 2.5 (Nice card however a bad crease on the card)

If I can get an address quick I'll ship today, otherwise it will be Monday.

Only selling as a pair, and throwing in a Poor conditioned trimmed T206 for free Mitchell, Toronto.
Solid deal, Jason. Best of luck :]
